Text:
Ok...it's going to get asked...
- Not the Russian Version? True Studio Audio- all english?

Yes - same crap that's been floating around. 
It says it right there in the description:
-.Audio: Engels(DD5.1) Studio Audio CM8

i am glad that some people can read. 

YES IT,S THE SAME CRAPE YOU HAVE TO WAIT FOR A BETTER VERSION.
tjonge wat een gezeik alweer jongens die was een verzoekje voor iemand als je een betere versie wilt zien zou je nog even moeten wachten
I thought the BRRip release date should have been February 05, 2013. Still nothing?

I thought the same until I rechecked the wikipedia article:

"it has been postponed to an unknown date."

WTF
FYI: May 14 will be released. You can already check it on Amazon.
